entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 06:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 13 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10 except minus 13 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
